channel.title: image-processing on AM
channel.description: Recent content in image-processing on AM

item.title: Logo Detection and Identification
item.description: I developed a logo detection and identification system in the context of the European project FIIA, a collaboration between the french research laboratory INRIA and the Icelandic computer vision company Videntifier. This project was a perfect occasion to put the computer vision theory I learned into practice. During this 18 months I enhanced my skills in OpenCV and Qt, and I coped with engineering project management. You can read the LDI project presentation for more information.

item.title: Body Building
item.description: Here is a very quick & dirty demo of an interactive dance app I made with OpenCV and Openframeworks. This is supposed to be used with a Kinect on a theatre or a cinema to create interactive art. This demo looks very bad, but I hope it shows the infinite possibilities one can compose with this kind of tool… I don’t really remember how to tweak every effects I implemented in this app, and I didn’t show everything, there is probably much more to experiment on stage.
